2 from geometry_msgs.msg import Pose, Point, Vector3, Quaternion
3 from tf_conversions import transformations

5 def poseToXYZRPYList(pose):
6  """
7  Converts a pose to an XYZ, RPY pose
8  """
9  x = pose.point.x
10  y = pose.point.y
11  z = pose.point.z
12  rot_x = pose.orientation.x
13  rot_y = pose.orientation.y
14  rot_z = pose.orientation.z
15  poseAsList = [x, y, z, rot_x, rot_y, rot_z]
16  return poseAsList
17 
18 def rpyVec3ToQuaternion(rpyVec):
19  """
20  Returns the quaternion of an RPY orientation
21  """
22  q0, q1, q2, q3 = transformations.quaternion_from_euler(rpyVec.x, rpyVec.y, rpyVec.z)
23  return Quaternion(q0, q1, q2, q3)
24 
25 def quaternionToRPYVec3(q):
26  """
27  returns an RPY orientation from a quaternion
28  """
29  r, p, y = transformations.euler_from_quaternion([q.x, q.y, q.z, q.w])
30  return Vector3(r, p, y)
